title: Zed + Leblanc= Zeblanca
body:
Just for fun
Zeblanca is the combination of both champion,
Passive: At low health Zeblanca spawn a clone that target the nearest enemy and does a total of 20% health+ 80% of AD and AP ratio.
Q: Throws a shoruken that puts a mark on the enemy, marking them for 10sec and deals a total of 80% of AD and AP ratio.
W: Dash foward leaving a clone behind and can blink back to the clone, if the clone is attacked it explode and does 60% of AD and AP ratio.
E: Throws a chain that root the target for 3sec aswell as slowing them for another 3sec and stunning them for another 3sec dealing 100% Ad and AP Ratio.
R: Summon a Clone that stays for 10sec and that spam all his previous ability on the same target, if the clones that it summon a vengeful Katarina Spirit that jumps on the whole enemy team dealing 200% of AD and AP ratio.

Skin concept: Definitly not Leblanc nor Zed and Maybe I am Katarina

replies.body: O3O My 1st rito reply, gotta screenshot this and post this on Twitter!
this is a meme and games dude, unless this isnt a joke which means you def are going to have to drop name and redo it balanced

talk about an overloaded kit, how about if his q was just, activate become level 18, and wer was, w=do tons of damage, e=hold them helplessly in place until dead and R= jump to target instakill. If target dies the cooldown is reset. 1500 range...because why not, lol
